function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Ensure comprehensive integration of policies, coordination among relevant stakeholders, and continuous monitoring and consultations, and industry expertise to gain a comprehensive understanding of the challenges.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use a combination of phone interviews and follow-up written surveys to verify and cross-check information. incorporate diverse perspectives to mitigate bias.","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total
